headline: Growth Strategy Team Lead
summary: Corporate Strategy, Business Coordination, M&A, IPO, Investment Analysis, Post-Merger Integration (PMI), C-Level Strategic Support, New Business Planning, and Cross-Functional Project Management.

positions.title: Team Lead: Growth Strategy Team, Media Business Unit
positions.description:
Team Lead: Growth Strategy Team, Media Business Unit, 2025

Team Lead: Business Strategy Team, CSO Department, 2024
- Analyze KT and its group companies' businesses, performing portfolio adjustment tasks, with a particular focus on enterprise and media/content sectors.

positions.title: Chief Financial Officer
positions.description:
- Successfully led the Initial Public Offering (IPO) on KOSDAQ.
- Oversaw and integrated multiple key departments, including finance & accounting, business planning, investor relations (IR), public relations (PR), human resources (HR), and legal affairs.
- Developed and implemented strategic financial plans that contributed to the company's turnaround to profitability in 2022, achieving an operating profit margin of 18% in 2023.

positions.title: Team Lead: Strategic Planning Team, Management Chief Division
positions.description:
- Planned and executed the acquisition of "Millie's Seojae," increasing its valuation from 110 billion KRW at acquisition to 185 billion KRW at IPO two years later.
- Led a task force to plan and develop "StoryG," a podcast-style audio service, successfully launching it.
- Executed the transfer of business for the music streaming service "Shop&Genie."

positions.title: Manager: Strategy & Planning Office
positions.description:
Business Coordinator: Strategy & Planning Office, 2014–2019
- Suggested directions for corporate strategy.
- Led the establishment of "Studio Discovery," a joint venture with Discovery, Inc., for content production.
- Reviewed financial plans of new businesses and developed restructuring strategies for those with low profit margins.
- Adjusted business structures for KT subsidiaries, including BC Card, KT Powertel, and KT Telecop.
- Initiated Big Data projects to enhance profit margins and planned a control-tower "Big Data Center."

Business Strategist: New Business Unit, 2013
- Developed market entry strategies for commerce based on financial analyses.
- Led a cross-functional team to evaluate the feasibility of various new business models.

Investment Manager: Strategy & Planning Office, 2010–2012
- Devised and executed KT Music’s equity structure transformation; attracted investments from SM, YG, and JYP.
- Analyzed strategic options for liquidating KT Tech, a mobile phone manufacturer.
- Directed the investment process in an ATM service provider as a minority shareholder.
- Designed concepts, functions, financial plans, and market entry strategies for a loyalty points program.

Assistant Manager: KT-KTF Merger Cross-functional Team, 2008–2009
- Crafted a thesis on the merger with KTF, Korea’s second-largest wireless carrier, in response to regulators.
- Reported regularly on project progress to the CEO and board of directors.
- Prioritized and executed action plans during the post-merger integration period.

positions.title: Sales Assistant: Sales Department, Yangpyoung Station Branch
positions.description: - Provided consultations on personal financial products, including mutual funds, derivatives, insurance, and credit cards.

positions.title: Component Developer: ERP Component Team
positions.description:
- Developed core components of "Eagle ERP," the first ERP system built on the C#.NET framework
- Designed and implemented comprehensive quality and operations management modules to optimize production processes and resource allocation
- Conducted ERP customization training sessions for over 200 developers from diverse companies, including Nexen Tire and Mitsui Knowledge Industry
